scripts.network: npm run pack:happ && concurrently-repeat "npm run start:app"
scripts.start:app: cross-env HC_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run playground" "npm run start:happ" "yarn --cwd ../ioen-app/ui ioen"
scripts.start:happ: npm run pack:happ && RUST_LOG=warn hc s generate ./workdir/ioen-app.happ --run=$HC_PORT -a ioen-app network mdns
scripts.start:picogridhapp: npm run pack:happ && RUST_LOG=warn hc s generate ./workdir/ioen-app.happ --run=$(port) -a ioen-app network mdns
